body.raw:
{
  "name": "Data Structures & Algorithms",
  "code": "CS201",
  "description": "Covers core data structures (lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs) and algorithmic techniques with complexity analysis and problem solving.",
  "departmentId": "{{departmentId}}",
  "credits": 3
}

request.description: Creates a new course record in the system.
Returns a specific course using its unique identifier.
Updates an existing course using its ID.
Creates a new class under the teacher, assigning course, semester, and schedule details.
Assigns one or more students to a specific class.
Marks the class as inactive so it can no longer be used.
Updates class name, semester, or schedule information.
